allow:
Bash(# Move documentation files
mv TASK_3*.md docs/completion-reports/
mv UI_DESIGN_COMPLETE.md docs/completion-reports/
mv CLAUDE.md docs/
mv README.md docs/

# Move configuration files
mv wrangler*.toml config/cloudflare/
mv tailwind.config.js config/build/
mv postcss.config.js config/build/
mv vite.config.js config/build/
mv jest.config.js config/build/
mv tsconfig*.json config/build/
mv package*.json config/env/

# Move test files
mv test-*.js tests/integration/
mv *test*.js tests/integration/
mv load-test-model-serving.js tests/load/
mv simple-validation-test.js tests/validation/
mv validate-deployment.js tests/validation/
mv api-test.js tests/integration/
mv storage-performance-test.js tests/integration/
mv etl-performance-report.js tests/integration/

# Move infrastructure files
mv model-serving-worker.js infrastructure/model-serving/
mv workers infrastructure/

# Move build artifacts and static files
mv _headers config/build/
mv _redirects config/build/)

Bash(# Move load testing files to correct location
mv tests/integration/load-test-model-serving.js tests/load/
mv tests/integration/simple-validation-test.js tests/validation/

# Move HTML test files to appropriate locations
mv *.html tests/integration/

# Create package.json in root for main project
cp config/env/package.json ./package.json)

Bash(# Move build configuration files properly
mv config/build/_headers ./
mv config/build/_redirects ./
mv config/build/tailwind.config.js ./
mv config/build/postcss.config.js ./
mv config/build/vite.config.js ./
mv config/build/jest.config.js ./
mv config/build/tsconfig*.json ./)
